title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1500.6 - Installation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1500.6 - Installation

State Regulations

Installation of a new fire alarm system in conformity with
generally accepted standards set forth in the appendix to these rules [FN*]
shall be deemed to comply with this Part. [FN*] See Appendix S-2. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1500.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
